prompt.item: Hello, I am EFA - Your Virtual 'First Aid' Assistance.
I am sorry, I did not understand your question. Please try to say it again in other words.

grammar.item: What kind of help do you provide?
* list of emergency situation do you have?

prompt.item: I can assist you on the First Aid situation like Alergic, Bleeding, Fracture, Burn, Heart Attack, etc. What emergency situation you are now?
My name is EFA! I'm virtual FirstAid assistance.

Hi, how are you today?

input.comment: Fine good $ I'm good $ I'm fine well $ I'm well good thanks

prompt.item: That's good

input.comment: $ I'm great excellent $ I'm excellent outstanding $ I'm outstanding fabulous $ I'm fabulous $ awesome $ terrific

prompt.item: Great to hear

input.comment: $ not good $ not so good $ not well $ not so well $ terrible $ awful $ worst $ bored $ sad $ tired $ hungry $ bored

prompt.item: I'm sorry to hear that.

input.comment: How are you? $ how have you been doing $ how is it going $ how's it going $ how are you $ what's shaking $ what's up

prompt.item: Can't complain.

input.comment: I need to go $ should be going $ should go $ need to go $ got to go $ gotta run $ gotta go $ need to run $ need to leave $ have to leave $ have to go $ gtg

prompt.item: Okay

output.comment: Did you find what you were looking for?

prompt.item: Did you find what you were looking for?
Excellent!
Goodbye
Welcome back!

output.comment: Would you like to try again?

prompt.item: Would you like to try again?
Okay.

output.comment: Okay. How can I help you?

prompt.item: Okay. How can I help you?

input.comment: What did you say? $ say that again $ say again $ what did you say $ come again $ say what

prompt.item: I said...

input.comment: Never mind $ never mind $ nevermind $ nvm $ forget it

prompt.item: Okay.

input.comment: What does X stand for? $ what does * mean $ do you mean by $ what are examples of $ what is an example of

prompt.item: EFA Stands for eFirstAid

input.comment: What is your favorite... $ your favorite $ you like $ you prefer

output.comment: 2001: A Space Odyssey. I like movies with a strong AI lead.

prompt.item: ANSWER - B2PP

concept.description: OI 15/7/11: Item "Sure" was removed from this list as it was causing issues with matches when two different input nodes had "I am not sure" and "$ yes". OI: 4/8/11: "fine" and "Good" were removed as well MO 18/10/12 removed "all right" and "alright" as they were causing conflict in perfect boyfriend MO 29/10/12 removed "always"

var.name: Request_Success
var.description: Did the user find what s/he was looking for?

var.name: Terminal_Exchange
var.description: Has the system already said goodbye?

var.name: emergency_type
var.description: Type of emergency that being requested by user

var.name: emergency_media
var.description: Type of emergency media that being requested to be displayed by user
